report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a normal-appearing thyroid gland with no evidence of nodules, cysts or masses. The gland is symmetric with a homogenous echotexture.
label: thy normal-thy

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows a solitary nodule in the right lobe measuring 1.5 cm in diameter. The nodule is solid and hypoechoic, with peripheral vascularity seen on Doppler imaging. No other significant abnormalities are identified.
label: thy nodule

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows multiple small nodules in both lobes, the largest measuring 0.8 cm in diameter. The nodules are predominantly isoechoic and have a regular shape. No concerning features are seen.
label: thy nodule nodules

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a large, irregularly shaped nodule in the left lobe measuring 4 cm in diameter. The nodule is predominantly solid with some areas of cystic degeneration. Peripheral vascularity is seen on Doppler imaging. Fine needle aspiration biopsy is recommended.
label: thy nodule

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows a heterogeneous echotexture with multiple nodules in both lobes. The largest nodule measures 1.2 cm in diameter and is solid and hypoechoic. No suspicious features are seen. Clinical correlation is recommended.
label: thy thyroiditis nodules nodule

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a small nodule in the right lobe measuring 0.6 cm in diameter. The nodule is predominantly cystic with some internal septations. No suspicious features are seen. Follow-up ultrasound in 6 months is recommended.
label: thy nodule

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows a diffusely enlarged gland with a heterogeneous echotexture. No focal nodules or masses are identified. Clinical correlation is recommended to evaluate for underlying thyroid disease.
label: thy goitre thyroiditis

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a small nodule in the left lobe measuring 0.8 cm in diameter. The nodule is predominantly solid with some cystic areas. No suspicious features are seen. Clinical correlation is recommended.
label: thy nodule

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows a complex cyst in the right lobe measuring 2.5 cm in diameter. No internal vascularity seen on Doppler imaging. No fine needle aspiration biopsy is neeeded.

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a multinodular goiter across both lobes.
label: thy nodules goitre nodule

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a U1 nodule in the left lobe measuring 0.9 cm in diameter. The nodule is solid and isoechoic, with regular margins and no suspicious features.

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows a U2 nodule in the right lobe measuring 1.4 cm in diameter. The nodule is solid and hypoechoic, with irregular margins and peripheral vascularity on Doppler imaging.

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a U3 nodule in the left lobe measuring 2.1 cm in diameter. The nodule is predominantly solid with some cystic components, irregular margins and marked peripheral vascularity on Doppler imaging. Fine needle aspiration biopsy is recommended.

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows a U4 nodule in the right lobe measuring 3.5 cm in diameter. label: thy u4 nodule

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates multiple nodules in both lobes, the largest measuring 1.7 cm in diameter with a U3 appearance. report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland shows a U2 nodule in the left lobe measuring 1.3 cm in diameter. The nodule is predominantly cystic with some internal echoes and no suspicious features. Follow-up ultrasound in 6 months is recommended.

report: Ultrasound of the thyroid gland demonstrates a U5 nodule in the right lobe measuring 4.2 cm in diameter. Urgent referral to a specialist thyroid clinic is recommended.
label: thy u5 nodule
